title: 3. IRRI Agronomy Challenge 2: First Fertilizer Application (28 December 2012)

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer to the rice field.
subtasks: Using a smartphone application for field-specific fertilizer recommendation.
Verifying the correct half of the field for additional fertilizer (hybrid strip).
Ensuring uniform distribution of the fertilizer across the field.
Walking along the sides of the rice rows while throwing the fertilizer to avoid waste.
Considering the impact of traditional broadcasting versus machine application on nutrient capture by young plants.
